Our dance intensives are for beginner, intermediate, and advanced students who have an interest in professional dance. It is our goal to create a nurturing environment to prepare students for professional dance training.

SALSA CLASSES

Our Salsa Classes for adults give you the opportunity to immerse yourself in the rhythms of Latin America.

BACHATA CLASSES

Bachata originated in the Dominican Republic and remains one of the most popular Latin American dance styles.

KIZOMBA CLASSES

Kizomba is one of the most popular genres of dance originating in Angola.

BALLET CLASSES

Ballet is a type of performance dance that originated in the Italian Renaissance courts of the 15th century.

FITNESS DANCE

Fitness Classes in an extensive range of styles and disciplines.

TANGO CLASSES

The Tango is a dance that expresses passion through intense, sharp and powerful movements.

WE USUALLY OFFER A VARIETY OF SERVICES

Street Dance is graceful, strong and will challenge your body in an a multitude of different ways. We offer classes in both Urban and Commercial Street dance, guiding you through practical introductions to different styles and building basic moves into full routines.

Bachata - Beginners

Bachata originated in the Dominican Republic and remains one of the most popular Latin American dance styles.

  • Introduction and warm up
  • Learning key Bachata choreography
  • Practising Bachata in hold
  • Adding style and flair to your dance

Street Dance

A street dance is a dance style—regardless of country of origin—that evolved outside dance studios in any available open space.

  • Learn about posture and position in dance
  • Develop greater balance and flexibility
  • Learn co-ordination and footwork
  • Learn to dance and perform routines

Kizomba - Advanced

Kizomba is one of the most popular genres of dance originating in Angola. Kizomba music became very close to zouk.

  • Warm up
  • Advanced key Kizomba choreography
  • Practising Kizomba in hold
  • Adding style and flair to your dance
